echo "Installing dependencies"
apk add --no-cache git musl-dev

echo "Cloning latest ferrumc"
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server
git clone https://github.com/ferrumc-rs/ferrumc.git

cd ferrumc/

echo "Copying executable to server directory."
cp ./ferrumc.release /mnt/server/FerrumC

echo "Cleaning up build directory."
rm -rf /mnt/server/ferrumc

echo "Ensuring execute permissions on executable."
chmod +x /mnt/server/FerrumC
